item.title: Large amount of litter of the verges, 6th April
item.description:
There is an exceptionally large amount of litter allong the verges all the way down the Golden Valley. Can a litter pick be scheduled before the vegetation grows back?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Churchdown

item.title: Significant Road / Bus Bay Damage, 4th April
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 305 Innsworth Lane, Churchdown

item.title: Grass verges need cutting/weed killing along path/highway, 3rd April
item.description:

item.title: Flytipping of plastic String Material, 3rd April
item.description:
This is the second report for this problem:- The location is the Entrance to the Old Quarry off Cleeve Common Road. There is rubbish in front of the entrance wall but more importantly behind the wall which has been used as a burn area there is a quantity of plastic string / shredded material. Please can it be cleared up as it will attract further tipping.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): The Dingle, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Goldsmith Road fresh water leak repair not completed, 3rd April
item.description:
The seven Trent team that repaired the leak outside 26 Goldsmith Road destroyed the grass verge and it’s not really mediated it sufficiently. Can somebody please write to them and get them to fix it

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 26 Goldsmith Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Out of sync, 2nd April
item.description:
When on Tewkesbury road and stopped at the lights to turn right, it seems that all the lights cycle through a number of times before the lights allow you to turn right causing some cars to overtake, jump the red light and cut across oncoming traffic from the other side to turn right
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 30 Tewkesbury Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
